      • submitAndWaitForAll

        public void submitAndWaitForAll(Iterable<Runnable> tasks)
        Submit a collection of tasks to the thread pool, and block until they complete. If the caller is running on a worker thread of this very pool, then temporarily increments the maximum number of threads while blocking.
        Specified by:
        submitAndWaitForAll in interface TreeExecutorService
        Parameters:
        tasks -
